Package business.entities.monster

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
business.entities.monster.Monster
Direct Known Subclasses:
Boss, StandardMonster
public abstract class Monster extends Object
Abstract class that represents a Monster.

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster(String name, String challenge, int experience, int hitPoints, int initiative, String damageDice, String damageType)
      Constructs a Monster with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the monster
      challenge - the challenge of the monster
      experience - the experience gained from defeating the monster
      hitPoints - the hit points of the monster
      initiative - the initiative value of the monster
      damageDice - the dice used for damage calculation
      damageType - the type of damage inflicted by the monster

    • Monster

      public Monster(Monster that)
      Constructs a Monster by copying another Monster.
      Parameters:
      that - the Monster to copy

      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • attack

      public int attack(Dice dice)
      Performs an attack by rolling the attack dice and calculating the damage.
      Parameters:
      dice - the dice object to use for rolling the attack dice
      Returns:
      the damage inflicted by the attack, or ATTACK_FAILED_RESULT if the attack failed
